seo.title: Pushpa 2 - The Rule (2024)
seo.description: Pushpa struggles to sustain his sandalwood smuggling business in the face of tough opposition from the police, led by arch-rival Bhanwar Singh Shekhawat.

seo.title: Pushpa: The Rise (2021)
seo.description: Pushpa Raj is a coolie who rises in the world of red sandalwood smuggling. Along the way, he doesn’t shy from making an enemy or two.

seo.title: Sarkaru Vaari Paata (2022)
seo.description: After being conned by the woman he loves, a finance agent arrives in India from the USA to retrieve his money from her father, a powerful MP and industrialist.

seo.title: Sarrainodu (2016)
seo.description: Ghana, a jobless young man who left military to bring justice to the society, whiling away timing beating up goons. Life takes a turn when he brushes the shady Vairam Dhanush the wrong way.

seo.title: Maharshi (2019)
seo.description: Rishi Kumar is a billionaire and the CEO of Origins, someone who has always strived for the success he now owns. His friend Ravi needs help, how will he come through?
